text: Blood is a collaborative album by American singer-songwriter Stan Ridgway and electronic musician Pietra Wexstun. It was released on September 23, 2003 by Sympathy for the Record Industry and A440 Records. ==Track listing== ==Personnel== Adapted from the Blood liner notes. ;Musicians *Alvin Fike – brass *Stan Ridgway – guitar, harmonica, Prophet-5 synthesizer, Chamberlin keyboard, sampler, production *Laslo Vickers – cello, contrabass, violin *Pietra Wexstun – piano, organ, mellotron, Juno 106 synthesizer, autoharp, sampler, voice, production ;Production and additional personnel *Bob Demaa – mastering *Brian Jackson – design, art direction *Sean P. Riley – executive production *Mark Ryden – design, art direction ==Release history== {|class="wikitable" ! Region ! Date ! Label ! Format ! Catalog |- |rowspan="2"| United States |rowspan="2"| 2003 | A440 |rowspan="2"| CD | 0001 |- | Sympathy for the Record Industry | SFTRI 732 |} ==References== == External links == * Category:2003 albums Category:Collaborative albums Category:Stan Ridgway albums Category:Albums produced by Stan Ridgway Category:Sympathy for the Record Industry albums
title: Blood (Stan Ridgway and Pietra Wexstun album)
